scripts.webhot: cd src/Pertisk.Web && dotnet watch run && cd ..
scripts.apihot: cd src/Pertisk.Api && dotnet watch run && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build_src && npm run build_test
scripts.testhot: cd test/Pertisk.DataAccess.UnitTests && dotnet watch test && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run access_test && npm run web_test
